医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，超过五分之一的加拿大人无法获得初级保健CMAJ 的最新研究发现，加拿大有超过五分之一的成年人无法获得初级保健，而且在获得初级保健方面存在巨大的地区差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/More-than-1-in-5-Canadians-lack-access-to-primary-care-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/More-than-1-in-5-Canadians-lack-access-to-primary-care-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc190e36-47f6-4331-9d59-f20758234a60 Tue, 21 May 2024 15:17:20 -0400 More than 1 in 5 Canadians lack access to primary care, research finds
英国的庇护程序对寻求庇护者的健康和福祉造成了损害东安格利亚大学的一项新研究表明，英国的庇护程序正在损害寻求庇护者的健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/UKs-asylum-process-takes-a-toll-on-the-health-and-wellbeing-ofe280afpeople-seeking-sanctuary.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/UKs-asylum-process-takes-a-toll-on-the-health-and-wellbeing-ofe280afpeople-seeking-sanctuary.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b621bedc-3b1b-404c-9​​cad-979ad20e49a6 Tue, 21 May 2024 15:11:54 -0400 UK's asylum process takes a toll on the health and wellbeing of people seeking sanctuary
研究人员破译免疫细胞如何发现癌症的涡轮增压代谢当细胞变成肿瘤细胞时，它们的新陈代谢会发生根本性的变化。巴塞尔大学和巴塞尔大学医院的研究人员现已证明，这种变化留下的痕迹可以为癌症免疫疗法提供靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Researchers-decipher-how-immune-cells-spot-cancers-turbocharged-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Researchers-decipher-how-immune-cells-spot-cancers-turbocharged-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06d201f8-4714-4085-a489-c53ec046a500 Tue, 21 May 2024 15:07:37 -0400 Researchers decipher how immune cells spot cancer's turbocharged metabolism
青少年的抗压能力低与以后患牛皮癣的风险较高有关难以应对压力的年轻人在以后的生活中更有可能患上牛皮癣。与高抗压能力相比，入伍时抗压能力低的人患牛皮癣的风险高出 31%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Low-stress-resilience-in-youth-linked-to-higher-psoriasis-risk-later.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Low-stress-resilience-in-youth-linked-to-higher-psoriasis-risk-later.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9f9247d-66a1-434a-846c-13d5b7146be3 Tue, 21 May 2024 15:02:00 -0400 Low stress resilience in youth linked to higher psoriasis risk later
研究为氯胺酮的作用提供了新的见解氯胺酮是世界卫生组织的基本药物，以不同剂量广泛用于镇静、控制疼痛、全身麻醉以及治疗难治性抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-offers-new-insights-into-how-ketamine-works.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Study-offers-new-insights-into-how-ketamine-works.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fadeb36e-1c71-4234-b161-bbbfc92821b9 Tue, 21 May 2024 14:56:27 -0400 Study offers new insights into how ketamine works
流行病加剧了十几岁男孩的抑郁症，而不是女孩爱思唯尔出版的《美国儿童和青少年精神病学学会杂志》(JAACAP) 上的一项研究发现，女孩和男孩受到这一流行病的影响不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Pandemic-worsens-depression-in-teenage-boys-not-girls.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Pandemic-worsens-depression-in-teenage-boys-not-girls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adb3a8ce-bebb-4ffd-9ca3-63819385466f Tue, 21 May 2024 14:37:00 -0400 Pandemic worsens depression in teenage boys, not girls
新发现可能有助于治疗内脏利什曼病西蒙娜·施泰格 (Simona Stäger) 团队的一项发现可能有助于找到治疗最严重形式的利什曼病的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/New-discovery-could-lead-to-a-treatment-for-visceral-leishmaniasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/New-discovery-could-lead-to-a-treatment-for-visceral-leishmaniasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e1d2b2-4333-4277-a087-979c8dc32ab3 Tue, 21 May 2024 14:27:52 -0400 New discovery could lead to a treatment for visceral leishmaniasis
抹茶绿茶粉可能有助于预防牙龈疾病细菌牙周炎是一种由细菌感染引起的炎症性牙龈疾病，如果不及时治疗，可能会导致牙齿脱落等并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Matcha-green-tea-powder-may-help-keep-gum-disease-bacteria-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Matcha-green-tea-powder-may-help-keep-gum-disease-bacteria-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a931f3cf-787a-4dea-bdb7-c5de94242404 Tue, 21 May 2024 14:20:24 -0400 Matcha green tea powder may help keep gum disease bacteria at bay
幻觉和噩梦可能预示着自身免疫性疾病的发生由剑桥大学和伦敦国王学院的研究人员领导的一个国际团队表示，噩梦和幻觉（或“白日噩梦”）的增加可能预示着狼疮等自身免疫性疾病的发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hallucinations-and-nightmares-could-herald-the-onset-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hallucinations-and-nightmares-could-herald-the-onset-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6d60a85-f144-4432-8c4a-9537024cb70a Tue, 21 May 2024 14:13:00 -0400 Hallucinations and nightmares could herald the onset of autoimmune diseases
独家：参议员敦促拜登政府阻止欺诈性的奥巴马医改注册强大的参议院财务委员会主席、参议员罗恩·怀登周一表示，需要立即采取更有力的行动，阻止保险经纪人以欺诈方式为平价医疗法案的承保范围登记或更换人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Exclusive-Senator-urges-Biden-administration-to-thwart-fraudulent-Obamacare-enrollments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Exclusive-Senator-urges-Biden-administration-to-thwart-fraudulent-Obamacare-enrollments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5173e2f0-5680-4d6a-ade0-59ee77841221 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:46:06 -0400 Exclusive: Senator urges Biden administration to thwart fraudulent Obamacare enrollments
